001package squidpony.squidmath;
002
003/**
004 * A group of similar methods for getting hashes of points based on long coordinates in 2, 3, 4, or 6 dimensions and
005 * a long for state. Internally, the methods here are based on a simplified version of Hive from {@link CrossHash};
006 * this version does not include the somewhat-involved finalization step. Omitting finalization helps this class be
007 * somewhat faster, but also makes it so it doesn't avalanche very well. Avalanche refers to the property of a hash
008 * where one changed bit in the input(s) or state has a chance to change any of the output's bits, and should
009 * usually change about 50% of them. You can call {@link #avalanche(long)} on the result of a hashAll() call to put
010 * the finalization step back. This has rather good quality when {@link #avalanche(long)} is used, but most usage
011 * will not be able to discern a difference between the quality of this (with or without avalanche) and the quality of
012 * {@link HastyPointHash}, where HastyPointHash is a fair amount faster. If your state and input are ints anyway,
013 * consider {@link IntPointHash}, since it's faster than the long-based hashes and still has perfectly fine quality.
014 * <br>
015 * This implements {@link IPointHash} and has a long it uses internally for state, exposed by {@link #getState()}.
016 */
017public class PointHash extends IPointHash.LongImpl
018{
019    public static final PointHash INSTANCE = new PointHash();
020
021    public PointHash() {
022        super();
023    }
024
025    public PointHash(int state) {
026        super(state);
027    }
028
029    public PointHash(long state) {
030        super(state);
031    }
032
033    @Override
034    public int hashWithState(int x, int y, int state) {
035        return (int)hashAll(x, y, state);
036    }
037
038    @Override
039    public int hashWithState(int x, int y, int z, int state) {
040        return (int)hashAll(x, y, z, state);
041    }
042
043    @Override
044    public int hashWithState(int x, int y, int z, int w, int state) {
045        return (int)hashAll(x, y, z, w, state);
046    }
047
048    @Override
049    public int hashWithState(int x, int y, int z, int w, int u, int state) {
050        return (int)hashAll(x, y, z, w, u, state);
051    }
052    @Override
053    public int hashWithState(int x, int y, int z, int w, int u, int v, int state) {
054        return (int)hashAll(x, y, z, w, u, v, state);
055    }
056
057    public long getState(){
058        return state;
059    }
060
061    /**
062     * If it's important for some usage that one bit of change in any parameters cause roughly 50% of all bits in
063     * the result to change, then you can call this on the output of any hashAll() overload to improve the bit
064     * avalanche qualities.
065     * @param state the output of hashAll() in this class
066     * @return a significantly-mixed-around long obtained from state
067     */
068    public static long avalanche(long state)
069    {
070        state = (state ^ state >>> 33) * 0xFF51AFD7ED558CCDL;
071        return (state ^ state >>> 33) * 0xC4CEB9FE1A85EC53L;
072    }
073    /**
074     *
075     * @param x
076     * @param y
077     * @param state
078     * @return 64-bit hash of the x,y point with the given state
079     */
080    public static long hashAll(long x, long y, long state)
081    {
082        state *= 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L;
083        long other = 0x60642E2A34326F15L;
084        state ^= (other += (x ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
085        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
086        state ^= (other += (y ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
087        state -= ((state << 54 | state >>> 10) + (other ^ other >>> 29)) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL;
088        return state ^ state >>> 31;
089        
090//            return ((x = ((x *= 0x6C8E9CF570932BD5L) ^ x >>> 26 ^ 0x9183A1F4F348E683L) * (
091//                    ((y = ((y *= 0x6C8E9CF570932BD5L) ^ y >>> 26 ^ 0x9183A1F4F348E683L) * (
092//                            state * 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L 
093//                                    | 1L)) ^ y >>> 24) 
094//                            | 1L)) ^ x >>> 24);
095
096//            state = (state ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL | 1L;
097//            x *= state;
098//            y *= state;
099//            return state ^ (x << 26 | x >>> 38) + (y << 23 | y >>> 41);
100
101//        return ((x = ((x *= 0x6C8E9CF570932BD5L) ^ x >>> 26 ^ 0x9183A1F4F348E683L) * (
102//                ((y = ((y *= 0x6C8E9CF570932BD5L) ^ y >>> 26 ^ 0x9183A1F4F348E683L) * (
103//                                        state * 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L
104//                                | 1L)) ^ y >>> 24)
105//                        | 1L)) ^ x >>> 24);
106
107//            return (x = ((x *= 0x6C8E9CF570932BD5L) ^ x >>> 26) * (state = state * 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L | 1L)) ^ x >>> 24
108//                    ^ (y = ((y *= 0x5851F42D4C957F2DL) ^ y >>> 26) * state) ^ y >>> 24;
109//            return ((state = ((state = x ^ ((state += 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L ^ y) ^ state >>> 30) * 0xBF58476D1CE4E5B9L) ^ state >>> 27) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL) ^ state >>> 31)
110//                    ^ ((state = ((state = y ^ ((state += 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L ^ x) ^ state >>> 30) * 0xBF58476D1CE4E5B9L) ^ state >>> 27) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL) ^ state >>> 31);
111        //state *= 0x352E9CF570932BDDL;
112//            return (((state = ((state += 0x6C8E9CD570932BD5L ^ x) ^ (state >>> 25)) * ((y ^ state) | 0xA529L)) ^ (state >>> 22)) ^
113//                    ((state = ((state += 0x6C8E9CD570932BD5L ^ y) ^ (state >>> 25)) * ((x ^ state) | 0xA529L)) ^ (state >>> 22)));
114    }
115
116    /**
117     *
118     * @param x
119     * @param y
120     * @param z
121     * @param state
122     * @return 64-bit hash of the x,y,z point with the given state
123     */
124    public static long hashAll(long x, long y, long z, long state)
125    {
126        state *= 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L;
127        long other = 0x60642E2A34326F15L;
128        state ^= (other += (x ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
129        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
130        state ^= (other += (y ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
131        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
132        state ^= (other += (z ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
133        state -= ((state << 54 | state >>> 10) + (other ^ other >>> 29)) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL;
134        return state ^ state >>> 31;
135
136//            return (x = ((x *= 0x6C8E9CF570932BD5L) ^ x >>> 26) * (state = state * 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L | 1L)) ^ x >>> 24
137//                    ^ (y = ((y *= 0x5851F42D4C957F2DL) ^ y >>> 26) * state) ^ y >>> 24
138//                    ^ (z = ((z *= 0xAEF17502108EF2D9L) ^ z >>> 26) * state) ^ z >>> 24;
139
140//            return ((state = ((state = x ^ ((state += 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L ^ y) ^ state >>> 30) * 0xBF58476D1CE4E5B9L) ^ state >>> 27) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL) ^ state >>> 31)
141//                    ^ ((state = ((state = y ^ ((state += 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L ^ z) ^ state >>> 30) * 0xBF58476D1CE4E5B9L) ^ state >>> 27) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL) ^ state >>> 31)
142//                    ^ ((state = ((state = z ^ ((state += 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L ^ x) ^ state >>> 30) * 0xBF58476D1CE4E5B9L) ^ state >>> 27) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL) ^ state >>> 31)
143//                    ;
144
145        //state *= 0x352E9CF570932BDDL;
146//            return (((state = ((state += 0x6C8E9CD570932BD5L ^ x) ^ (state >>> 25)) * ((state ^ y) | 0xA529L)) ^ (state >>> 22)) ^
147//                    ((state = ((state += 0x6C8E9CD570932BD5L ^ y) ^ (state >>> 25)) * ((state ^ z) | 0xA529L)) ^ (state >>> 22)) ^
148//                    ((state = ((state += 0x6C8E9CD570932BD5L ^ z) ^ (state >>> 25)) * ((state ^ x) | 0xA529L)) ^ (state >>> 22)));
149    }
150
151    /**
152     *
153     * @param x
154     * @param y
155     * @param z
156     * @param w
157     * @param state
158     * @return 64-bit hash of the x,y,z,w point with the given state
159     */
160    public static long hashAll(long x, long y, long z, long w, long state)
161    {
162        state *= 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L;
163        long other = 0x60642E2A34326F15L;
164        state ^= (other += (x ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
165        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
166        state ^= (other += (y ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
167        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
168        state ^= (other += (z ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
169        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
170        state ^= (other += (w ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
171        state -= ((state << 54 | state >>> 10) + (other ^ other >>> 29)) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL;
172        return state ^ state >>> 31;
173
174//            return (x = ((x *= 0x6C8E9CF570932BD5L) ^ x >>> 26) * (state = state * 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L | 1L)) ^ x >>> 24
175//                    ^ (y = ((y *= 0x5851F42D4C957F2DL) ^ y >>> 26) * state) ^ y >>> 24
176//                    ^ (z = ((z *= 0xAEF17502108EF2D9L) ^ z >>> 26) * state) ^ z >>> 24
177//                    ^ (w = ((w *= 0x94D049BB133111EBL) ^ w >>> 26) * state) ^ w >>> 24;
178
179//            return ((state = ((state = x ^ ((state += 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L ^ y) ^ state >>> 30) * 0xBF58476D1CE4E5B9L) ^ state >>> 27) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL) ^ state >>> 31)
180//                    ^ ((state = ((state = y ^ ((state += 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L ^ z) ^ state >>> 30) * 0xBF58476D1CE4E5B9L) ^ state >>> 27) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL) ^ state >>> 31)
181//                    ^ ((state = ((state = z ^ ((state += 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L ^ w) ^ state >>> 30) * 0xBF58476D1CE4E5B9L) ^ state >>> 27) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL) ^ state >>> 31)
182//                    ^ ((state = ((state = w ^ ((state += 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L ^ x) ^ state >>> 30) * 0xBF58476D1CE4E5B9L) ^ state >>> 27) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL) ^ state >>> 31)
183//                    ;
184
185        //state *= 0x352E9CF570932BDDL;
186//            return (((state = ((state += 0x6C8E9CD570932BD5L ^ x) ^ (state >>> 25)) * ((state ^ y) | 0xA529L)) ^ (state >>> 22)) ^
187//                    ((state = ((state += 0x6C8E9CD570932BD5L ^ y) ^ (state >>> 25)) * ((state ^ z) | 0xA529L)) ^ (state >>> 22)) ^
188//                    ((state = ((state += 0x6C8E9CD570932BD5L ^ z) ^ (state >>> 25)) * ((state ^ w) | 0xA529L)) ^ (state >>> 22)) ^
189//                    ((state = ((state += 0x6C8E9CD570932BD5L ^ w) ^ (state >>> 25)) * ((state ^ x) | 0xA529L)) ^ (state >>> 22)));
190    }
191
192    /**
193     *
194     * @param x
195     * @param y
196     * @param z
197     * @param w
198     * @param u
199     * @param state
200     * @return 64-bit hash of the x,y,z,w,u point with the given state
201     */
202    public static long hashAll(long x, long y, long z, long w, long u, long state)
203    {
204        state *= 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L;
205        long other = 0x60642E2A34326F15L;
206        state ^= (other += (x ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
207        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
208        state ^= (other += (y ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
209        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
210        state ^= (other += (z ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
211        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
212        state ^= (other += (w ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
213        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
214        state ^= (other += (u ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
215        state -= ((state << 54 | state >>> 10) + (other ^ other >>> 29)) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL;
216        return state ^ state >>> 31;
217    }
218    /**
219     *
220     * @param x
221     * @param y
222     * @param z
223     * @param w
224     * @param u
225     * @param v
226     * @param state
227     * @return 64-bit hash of the x,y,z,w,u,v point with the given state
228     */
229    public static long hashAll(long x, long y, long z, long w, long u, long v, long state)
230    {
231        state *= 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L;
232        long other = 0x60642E2A34326F15L;
233        state ^= (other += (x ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
234        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
235        state ^= (other += (y ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
236        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
237        state ^= (other += (z ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
238        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
239        state ^= (other += (w ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
240        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
241        state ^= (other += (u ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
242        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
243        state ^= (other += (v ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
244        state -= ((state << 54 | state >>> 10) + (other ^ other >>> 29)) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL;
245        return state ^ state >>> 31;
246
247//            return (x = ((x *= 0x6C8E9CF570932BD5L) ^ x >>> 26) * (state = state * 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L | 1L)) ^ x >>> 24
248//                    ^ (y = ((y *= 0x5851F42D4C957F2DL) ^ y >>> 26) * state) ^ y >>> 24
249//                    ^ (z = ((z *= 0xAEF17502108EF2D9L) ^ z >>> 26) * state) ^ z >>> 24
250//                    ^ (w = ((w *= 0x94D049BB133111EBL) ^ w >>> 26) * state) ^ w >>> 24
251//                    ^ (u = ((u *= 0xBF58476D1CE4E5B9L) ^ u >>> 26) * state) ^ u >>> 24
252//                    ^ (v = ((v *= 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) ^ v >>> 26) * state) ^ v >>> 24;
253
254//            return ((state = ((state = x ^ ((state += 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L ^ y) ^ state >>> 30) * 0xBF58476D1CE4E5B9L) ^ state >>> 27) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL) ^ state >>> 31)
255//                    ^ ((state = ((state = y ^ ((state += 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L ^ z) ^ state >>> 30) * 0xBF58476D1CE4E5B9L) ^ state >>> 27) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL) ^ state >>> 31)
256//                    ^ ((state = ((state = z ^ ((state += 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L ^ w) ^ state >>> 30) * 0xBF58476D1CE4E5B9L) ^ state >>> 27) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL) ^ state >>> 31)
257//                    ^ ((state = ((state = w ^ ((state += 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L ^ u) ^ state >>> 30) * 0xBF58476D1CE4E5B9L) ^ state >>> 27) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL) ^ state >>> 31)
258//                    ^ ((state = ((state = u ^ ((state += 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L ^ v) ^ state >>> 30) * 0xBF58476D1CE4E5B9L) ^ state >>> 27) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL) ^ state >>> 31)
259//                    ^ ((state = ((state = v ^ ((state += 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L ^ x) ^ state >>> 30) * 0xBF58476D1CE4E5B9L) ^ state >>> 27) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL) ^ state >>> 31)
260//                    ;
261
262        //state *= 0x352E9CF570932BDDL;
263//            return (((state = ((state += 0x6C8E9CD570932BD5L ^ x) ^ (state >>> 25)) * ((state ^ y) | 0xA529L)) ^ (state >>> 22)) ^
264//                    ((state = ((state += 0x6C8E9CD570932BD5L ^ y) ^ (state >>> 25)) * ((state ^ z) | 0xA529L)) ^ (state >>> 22)) ^
265//                    ((state = ((state += 0x6C8E9CD570932BD5L ^ z) ^ (state >>> 25)) * ((state ^ w) | 0xA529L)) ^ (state >>> 22)) ^
266//                    ((state = ((state += 0x6C8E9CD570932BD5L ^ w) ^ (state >>> 25)) * ((state ^ u) | 0xA529L)) ^ (state >>> 22)) ^
267//                    ((state = ((state += 0x6C8E9CD570932BD5L ^ u) ^ (state >>> 25)) * ((state ^ v) | 0xA529L)) ^ (state >>> 22)) ^
268//                    ((state = ((state += 0x6C8E9CD570932BD5L ^ v) ^ (state >>> 25)) * ((state ^ x) | 0xA529L)) ^ (state >>> 22)));
269    }
270    /**
271     *
272     * @param x
273     * @param y
274     * @param state
275     * @return 8-bit hash of the x,y point with the given state
276     */         
277    public static int hash256(long x, long y, long state) {
278        state *= 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L;
279        long other = 0x60642E2A34326F15L;
280        state ^= (other += (x ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
281        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
282        state ^= (other += (y ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
283        return (int)(state - ((state << 54 | state >>> 10) + (other ^ other >>> 29)) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL >>> 56);
284
285//            return (int) (((((x *= 0x6C8E9CF570932BD5L) ^ x >>> 26) * (state = state * 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L | 1L))
286//                    ^ (((y *= 0x5851F42D4C957F2DL) ^ y >>> 26) * state)) >>> 56);
287
288//                return (int) ((
289//                    ((state = ((state = x ^ ((state += 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L ^ y) ^ state >>> 30) * 0xBF58476D1CE4E5B9L) ^ state >>> 27) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL))
290//                    ^ ((((state = y ^ ((state += 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L ^ x) ^ state >>> 30) * 0xBF58476D1CE4E5B9L) ^ state >>> 27) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL))
291//            ) >>> 56);
292
293        //state *= 0x352E9CF570932BDDL;
294//            return (int) ((((state = ((state += 0x6C8E9CD570932BD5L ^ x) ^ (state >>> 25)) * ((y ^ state) | 0xA529L)) ^ (state >>> 22)) ^
295//                    (((state += 0x6C8E9CD570932BD5L ^ y) ^ (state >>> 25)) * ((x ^ state) | 0xA529L))) >>> 56);
296    }
297    /**
298     *
299     * @param x
300     * @param y
301     * @param z
302     * @param state
303     * @return 8-bit hash of the x,y,z point with the given state
304     */
305    public static int hash256(long x, long y, long z, long state)
306    {
307        state *= 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L;
308        long other = 0x60642E2A34326F15L;
309        state ^= (other += (x ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
310        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
311        state ^= (other += (y ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
312        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
313        state ^= (other += (z ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
314        return (int)(state - ((state << 54 | state >>> 10) + (other ^ other >>> 29)) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL >>> 56);
315
316//            return (int) (((((x *= 0x6C8E9CF570932BD5L) ^ x >>> 26) * (state = state * 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L | 1L))
317//                    ^ (((y *= 0x5851F42D4C957F2DL) ^ y >>> 26) * state)
318//                    ^ (((z *= 0xAEF17502108EF2D9L) ^ z >>> 26) * state)
319//            ) >>> 56);
320
321//            return (int) ((
322//                    ((state = ((state = x ^ ((state += 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L ^ y) ^ state >>> 30) * 0xBF58476D1CE4E5B9L) ^ state >>> 27) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL))
323//                            ^ ((state = ((state = y ^ ((state += 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L ^ z) ^ state >>> 30) * 0xBF58476D1CE4E5B9L) ^ state >>> 27) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL))
324//                            ^ ((((state = z ^ ((state += 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L ^ x) ^ state >>> 30) * 0xBF58476D1CE4E5B9L) ^ state >>> 27) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL))
325//            ) >>> 56);
326
327        //state *= 0x352E9CF570932BDDL;
328//            return (int) ((((state = ((state += 0x6C8E9CD570932BD5L ^ x) ^ (state >>> 25)) * ((state ^ y) | 0xA529L)) ^ (state >>> 22)) ^
329//                    ((state = ((state += 0x6C8E9CD570932BD5L ^ y) ^ (state >>> 25)) * ((state ^ z) | 0xA529L)) ^ (state >>> 22)) ^
330//                    (((state += 0x6C8E9CD570932BD5L ^ z) ^ (state >>> 25)) * ((state ^ x) | 0xA529L))) >>> 56);
331    }
332    /**
333     *
334     * @param x
335     * @param y
336     * @param z
337     * @param w
338     * @param state
339     * @return 8-bit hash of the x,y,z,w point with the given state
340     */
341    public static int hash256(long x, long y, long z, long w, long state)
342    {
343        state *= 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L;
344        long other = 0x60642E2A34326F15L;
345        state ^= (other += (x ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
346        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
347        state ^= (other += (y ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
348        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
349        state ^= (other += (z ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
350        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
351        state ^= (other += (w ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
352        return (int)(state - ((state << 54 | state >>> 10) + (other ^ other >>> 29)) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL >>> 56);
353

371    /**
372     *
373     * @param x
374     * @param y
375     * @param z
376     * @param w
377     * @param u
378     * @param v
379     * @param state
380     * @return 8-bit hash of the x,y,z,w,u,v point with the given state
381     */
382    public static int hash256(long x, long y, long z, long w, long u, long v, long state)
383    {
384        state *= 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L;
385        long other = 0x60642E2A34326F15L;
386        state ^= (other += (x ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
387        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
388        state ^= (other += (y ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
389        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);

395        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
396        state ^= (other += (v ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);

648    /**

654     * @param state
655     * @return 6-bit hash of the x,y,z,w point with the given state
656     */
657    public static int hash64(long x, long y, long z, long w, long state)
658    {
659        state *= 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L;
660        long other = 0x60642E2A34326F15L;
661        state ^= (other += (x ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
662        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
663        state ^= (other += (y ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
664        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
665        state ^= (other += (z ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
666        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
667        state ^= (other += (w ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
668        return (int)(state - ((state << 54 | state >>> 10) + (other ^ other >>> 29)) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL >>> 58);
669
670//            return (int) (((((x *= 0x6C8E9CF570932BD5L) ^ x >>> 26) * (state = state * 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L | 1L))
671//                    ^ (((y *= 0x5851F42D4C957F2DL) ^ y >>> 26) * state)
672//                    ^ (((z *= 0xAEF17502108EF2D9L) ^ z >>> 26) * state)
673//                    ^ (((w *= 0x94D049BB133111EBL) ^ w >>> 26) * state)
674//            ) >>> 58);

678//                            ^ ((state = ((state = y ^ ((state += 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L ^ z) ^ state >>> 30) * 0xBF58476D1CE4E5B9L) ^ state >>> 27) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL))

689    /**
690     *
691     * @param x
692     * @param y
693     * @param z
694     * @param w
695     * @param u
696     * @param v
697     * @param state
698     * @return 6-bit hash of the x,y,z,w,u,v point with the given state
699     */
700    public static int hash64(long x, long y, long z, long w, long u, long v, long state)
701    {
702        state *= 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L;
703        long other = 0x60642E2A34326F15L;
704        state ^= (other += (x ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
705        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
706        state ^= (other += (y ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
707        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
708        state ^= (other += (z ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
709        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
710        state ^= (other += (w ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
711        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
712        state ^= (other += (u ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
713        state = (state << 54 | state >>> 10);
714        state ^= (other += (v ^ 0xC6BC279692B5CC85L) * 0x6C8E9CF570932BABL);
715        return (int)(state - ((state << 54 | state >>> 10) + (other ^ other >>> 29)) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL >>> 58);

727//                            ^ ((state = ((state = y ^ ((state += 0x9E3779B97F4A7C15L ^ z) ^ state >>> 30) * 0xBF58476D1CE4E5B9L) ^ state >>> 27) * 0x94D049BB133111EBL))
